name: Invelity GLS ParcelShop
author: Invelity

sections.description:
Plugin Invelity GLS ParcelShop je určený pre pridanie dopravnej metódy a pop-up okna s mapou pobočiek GLS ParcelShopov na Slovensku.
Plugin pridáva doručovaciu adresu podľa vybranej pobočky.
Plugin jednoducho stiahnite, nainštalujte, aktivujte a pridajte GLS ParcelShop v dopravných zónach.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin and upload files directly via FTP (`/wp-content/plugins/invelity-ikros-invoices).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Add GLS Parcel Shop as shipping method
sections.faq:
Do I need anything else for this plugin to work?

You need online store build using WooCommerce plugin.

Is the plugin free?

Yes. The plugin is free of charge.
We offer support, installation, setup and customization for a fee, contact us at https://www.invelity.com/ or directly at mike@invelity.com
